taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe chaenactidinae;genus hymenothrix;species wislizeni

bio:treatment.description: Annuals, 30–70 cm. Phyllaries 8(–12), mostly linear to narrowly oblanceolate. Rays 3–8. Disc florets 15–30; corollas creamy to bright yellow, mostly 5–7 mm, lobe lengths 0.3–1 times throats; anthers yellowish. Cypselae 3–5 mm; pappus scales 1.5–6 mm. 2n = 24, 48.
Open slopes and washes, sandy or gravelly soils;
